org.apache.xml.security.encryption.EncryptedData

org.apache.xml.security.encryption Provides classes for implementing XML Encryption applications.

 org.w3c.dom.Element XMLCipher.martial(EncryptedData encryptedData)
          Martial an EncryptedData Takes an EncryptedData object and returns a DOM Element that represents the appropriate EncryptedData Note: This should only be used in cases where the context document has been passed in via a call to doFinal.
